welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ifield, a charming town known for its beautiful parks, historic monuments, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves both domestic and international flights, with a variety of shops, restaurants, and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busier of the two terminals, with a wide range of airlines and destinations served. It offers a variety of shops, restaurants, and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, with a 90-minute time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, used for international flights and home to Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the busiest terminals at Heathrow Airport, used for long-haul flights and home to Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, used for long-haul flights and home to SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, used for long-haul flights and home to British Airways.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium options are also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Farnborough Airport offers exclusive services for private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private jet passengers, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private jet owners and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for all passengers.
